posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dustan Hedlin
Looking for a boost to my T206 collection, and I'm hoping to find a group of these that someone is looking to move that can help me in my journey to get to 520.  I have 26 now, slowly but surely I'm getting there.  Please list what you have, and a group price.  Or email me at dustanhedlin@gmail.com.


Thanks,
Dustan

Posted By: Dustan Hedlin
Thanks for the replies; I picked up 10 in total.  I'll bump this in another month or two when I am prepared to buy another 10 or so.
